law.history: Repealed 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 26. -- Created 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) ch. 7, Article IV, sec. 5; effective July 1, 1956.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Appointing officer of State agency may remove employe; notice to Department of Personnel; statement setting forth reasons for removal; action final, when.
